Name: DPS IDLE
About the game: An idle card game where you kill monsters. From monsters, you get money to open chests. Each chest has its own deck of cards! Features Idle card game : Many different cards and different decks. Cards can be improved in many ways. Powerful Guilds : not only cards decide everything - the right choice of Guilds can have a significant impact on the game. With each game, the guilds become stronger. Heroes : Hire the hero that best suits your style of play. Choosing the right hero in conjunction with the guild will move you forward. Versatile game : in addition to receiving cards and killing monsters, the game has a lot of secondary affairs. For example, magic, alchemy, quests, mining resources and much more.
